cause.description:
Have you ever had a homeless person beg you for your hard earned dollar so that they can buy drugs or booze? These people have a severe problem; it's called LAZINESS. Support this cause. The next time a homeless person asks you for a couple of bucks, laugh in their face and tell them what a funny clown they are. If people wouldn't give them money, they would be forced to get jobs.
THANK YOU AND GOD BLESS AMERICA
1. MISSIONARY
2. REVERSE COWGIRL
3. PREDATOR
cause.name: College Students Against Lazy Homeless People
